author: sobryan
msg: Fix for the Portlet Bridge dependency issue related to my checkin for
TRINIDAD-134.  It now works in Jetty.
Essentially I move access of the required bridge classes to a
package-private utility class.  Because of the architecture of the
JSR-301 bridge, I believe this will be one of the few cases that
we will have to use this method since 301 makes use of annotations
which are optional at runtime to do many of its custom logic.  If,
however more of these types of methods are needed, we may want to make
this a public utility packaged class in impl.
